subject: Doctors
Sentences (Criminal)
Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
Human Growth Hormone
Athletics and Sports
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Anthony Galea, of Toronto, who treated star athletes like Tiger Woods and Alex Rodriguez, was sentenced to time served, which amounts to a single day.
snippet: Anthony Galea, of Toronto, who treated star athletes like Tiger Woods and Alex Rodriguez, was sentenced to time served, which amounts to a single day.
